content.rendered:
2017 America’s Cup Schedule

Custom Packages are available for the five different segments of the 2017 America’s Cup:

  • May 25 – 30 – Opening Ceremonies and First Qualifiers Weekend
  • June 1 – 6 – Second Section of Round Robin Qualifiers
  • June 8 – 13 – Semi-Finalist Challenger Playoffs
  • June 15 – 20 – America’s Cup Finals Weekend One
  • June 22 – 28 – America’s Cup Finals Weekend Two

(Additional Nights and Custom Packages Available)
